title: Schema for comprehensive testing of Json.Schema.Validation

testSuites.description: An object containing two instances, the first of which fails all the checks and second of which passes them.

testSuite.description: Defines sub-schemas for exercising each validation rule

JSON1001_WrongType.description: Instance file provides incorrect property type.

integerProperty.description: A property whose type is integer

JSON1002_RequiredPropertyMissing.description: Instance file fails to provide a required property.

JSON1003_TooFewArrayItems.description: Instance file provides too few array items.

JSON1004_TooManyArrayItems.description: Instance file provides too many array items.

JSON1005_AdditionalPropertiesProhibited.description: Instance file mentions a property not defined in  the schema.

JSON1006_ValueTooLarge.description: Instance file provides too large a value for a numeric property.

JSON1007_ValueTooLargeExclusive.description: Instance file provides too large a value for a numeric property (exclusive maximum).

JSON1008_ValueTooSmall.description: Instance file provides too small a value for a numeric property.

JSON1009_ValueTooSmallExclusive.description: Instance file provides too small a value for a numeric property (exclusive minimum).

JSON1010_TooManyProperties.description: Instance file provides too many properties

JSON1011_TooFewProperties.description: Instance file provides too few properties
